name: df-mul
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5, setvar s6
body: |- wceq(cmul, coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cc), wcel(cv(s1), cc)), wex(s3, wex(s4, wex(s5, wex(s6, wa(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s3), cv(s4))), wceq(cv(s1), cop(cv(s5), cv(s6)))), wceq(cv(s2), cop(co(co(cv(s3), cmr, cv(s5)), cplr, co(cm1r, cmr, co(cv(s4), cmr, cv(s6)))), co(co(cv(s4), cmr, cv(s5)), cplr, co(cv(s3), cmr, cv(s6)))))))))))))
comment: Define multiplication over complex numbers. (Contributed by NM, 9-Aug-1995.) (New usage is discouraged.)
